_comment: TEMPLATE - Copy this structure to add new job openings. Remove this object before publishing.
title: Job Title Here
description: Brief description of the role and its impact on the organization.

title: Community Manager
description: Lead and grow our global tech community through engaging events, content, and programs.
expectations: Build and nurture relationships with community members
Organize and execute community events and programs
Create engaging content for various platforms
Monitor community health and engagement metrics

title: Content Creator
description: Create compelling content that showcases our community, events, and impact across all media channels.
expectations: Produce high-quality written and visual content
Manage social media presence and engagement
Collaborate with the team on content strategy
